Once in a vibrant savanna, there lived a giraffe named Gemma, who was unlike any otherâ€”she had a short neck. While her friends reached the tallest acacia trees, Gemma found herself munching on the grass below. Initially, she felt left out and sad, but soon discovered a hidden talent. With her nimble legs, she could sprint faster than any giraffe in the herd. One day, a lion threatened the group, and Gemma led her friends to safety, using her speed and cleverness. From that day on, Gemma learned that true strength comes in many forms, and her short neck was her unique gift.
